EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-09-10 Partner Town Hall.WBN: 2018-09-10 Partner Town Hall - Invite 1.WB
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited! Partner Town Hall on September 10th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/quarterly-partner-town-hall/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
As a valued partner, we would like to invite you to join us on our upcoming Quarterly Partner Town Hall <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/quarterly-partner-town-hall/]]> Webcast. This online event will take place on Monday, September 10, 2018 at 1:00pm ET.
This is a fantastic opportunity for you to connect with your peers, learn about the latest and greatest Turbonomic product and company announcements, and how you can leverage these initiatives to accelerate your selling efforts.
Date: Monday, September 10, 2018
Time: 11:00am PT/1:00pm ET
Agenda:
- Partner Program Updates
- Turbonomic Product Updates
- Questions & Answers
Due to proprietary information being discussed during this webinar, we require that you register with your work email address. Please click here to register <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/quarterly-partner-town-hall/]]> for this event.
We look forward to seeing on this webinar!
Regards, Turbonomic Channel & Alliances Team
